name: Tasukete Zero
description:
Hello there. This is my project. Tasukete zero. It is a survivor horror oneshot game. ATENTION> For now only Xbox controller version is available. But soon enough I'll upload keyboard version.

The game passes in Japan, and tells the story of a cop called Sakuya, who is investigating an abandoned case. This first project is a short game.

*If you notice any flaws or glitches, let me know.
